outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Intricate symbols adorn the cavern walls. The interconnected circles, etched with precision, guide the way. Following their trail unveils a subtle vibration underfoot, leading to the concealed entrance of a [b][color=blue]Hidden Chamber[/color][/b].

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Follow the markings in the walls

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
Bathed in soft luminescence, the [b]Hidden Chamber[/b] boasts intricate carvings and a central pedestal. Resting on it is an ancient key, resonating with the symbols on the walls. The chamber beckons exploration, promising further secrets in the depths of the caves.

For now, you decide to take the key to [b][color=blue]Elder Gavric[/color][/b]
